suggestion: Shop second hand to find afforadable, unique, sustainable fashion items
description: Second hand shopping is arguably the most sustainable way to consumer fashion and almost the most affordable. By choosing used items over new, you reduce your carbon footprint by 60-70% by eliminating the harmful carbon emitted when producing a new garment and reducing clothes waste ending up in landfull. Now more than ever it is easy to shop second hand through high street charity shopping, carboot sales and online through Ebay and apps such as Vinted, Vestaire Collective and Depop

suggestion: Use Good On You to check brands sustainibility and ethics ratings
description: One of the biggest difficulties in shopping ethically and sustainably is the lack of immediate knowledge in the pratices and sustainability levels of particular brands and the time it can take to seek out this information. The Good On You App is a convenient tool to check out the sustianability and ethics ratings of fashion brands and to also disover sustainable fashion brands
